title: Smite's getting sandbox mode in its next patch
body:
sauce: http://www.gamespot.com/articles/new-smite-patch-introduces-a-training-map-weakens-/1100-6429857/

> Another of the game's practice modes, Jungle practice, has been updated. In addition to visual changes, players can now reset their abilities, buy and sell items from anywhere on the map (instead of just at the spawn area), and test out attacks on invincible Odin target dummies.

Meanwhile at Riot Games:

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MO3V6c0Hsl4/UW365Hfz9EI/AAAAAAAAI68/51epGB4UBQ8/s1600/computer-hacker-break-the-security.gif
